Commands.Focus: Self: 2 turns ATK Up II, MAX BRV Up II
Commands.Meteor (IX): 3-HIT AoE BRV+HP attack.HP damage dealt is divided equally amongst all targets.Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target.BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV.Grants Double Black Magic for 4 turns.Turns HP Attack to HP Attack+ while Double Black Magic is active.Double Black Magic grants BRV regen.

Artifacts.BRV Initiative: Raises Speed by 5% when BRV is over 50% Max BRV.
Artifacts.Break BRV Up: Raises Max BRV by 5% for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Artifacts.Mighty Fire: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Fire by 10%.
Artifacts.Bravery Focus: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after using Focus.

Passives.BRV Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Fire Charge: Increases the max uses of Fire by 1.
Passives.Fire Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using Fire.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Focus Light: Slightly reduces action delay after using Focus.
Passives.Fire Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Fire.
Passives.Focus Charge: Increases the max uses of Focus by 1.
Passives.Kill BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after killing an enemy.
Passives.Black Mage's Mystery: Grants a low probability of poisoning the target with a Fire attack.
Passives.Speed Buff: Slightly raises SPD with active buffs
Passives.Fire Extension: Raises cumulative power of Fire(becomes 2-hit Fire magic BRV attack)
Passives.Buffed Attack Boost Up: Moderately raises MAX BRV, ATK with active buffs
Passives.Focus Extension: Focus use +1When using Focus:Slight ATK Up boostUpon using Focus: BRV Attack becomes powerful BRV Attack+ (Fire magic BRV attack) for 4 turns Fire becomes Fire+ (triggers additional HP attack after last hit if BRV is at least 80% of MAX) for 4 turns

Weapons.Cypress Pile: Lowers the action delay of Focus.Increases the potency of Attack Up and Max BRV Up and extends their duration.Raises BRV based on Attack.
